catalogue.message: Congratulations on your first Okapi-powered page.
Of course, you haven't actually done any work yet. Here's what to do next:
Start programming your commands inside the localinc directory.
Adjust the routes inside the file conf/commandmap.php to your needs.
Implement the XSL in the directory themes like the file themes/default/default.xsl.
Okapi default page. Time to get up, dust yourself off and get to work, you lazy programmer!
